snippet: The United States rallied past France, 2-1, at the Hopman Cup in Perth, Australia, with John Isner and Venus Williams capturing the decisive mixed doubles.
abstract: United States rallies past France, 2-1, at tennis's Hopman Cup in Perth, Australia, with John Isner and Venus Williams capturing the decisive mixed doubles.
lead_paragraph: The United States rallied past France, 2-1, at the Hopman Cup in Perth, Australia, with John Isner and Venus Williams capturing the decisive mixed doubles.
